Ooh, it’s not enough for me! I need more. I hope you’ll try harder next time!

So many people want to help me! If your contribution to the cause is substantial I'll make sure to honor it with a reward!

common_json.WeeklyCupTable.title: Weekly cup
common_json.Race.force: When I visited my grandpa the last time he mentioned something about preparing a surprise for me. It's time to find out what he was talking about!
common_json.Memorial.Race.force: I can't wait to visit my grandpa! He said that he prepared something special for Memorial Day. It's time to find out what he was talking about!
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_0.0: Chloe, do you want to become a part of history? My friends and I are organizing an aerostat race and I want you to be my navigator!
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_0.1: You bet, grandpa! I would love to join you. Funnily enough, I just saw an ad for a great zeppelin not that long ago.
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_0.2: Actually, I was thinking about my old hot air balloon which has been in my garage for years. But your idea sounds even better!
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_7.0: Great job, Chloe! Are you glad that you decided to partake in the race?
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_7.1: I couldn't be happier, grandpa! This is so exciting. I'm curious how many more chests will we open along the way?
common_json.Race.dialogue.free_stage_9.0: Do you remember telling me about that fancy dirigible? The new generation one. How can we get it?
common_json.Race.dialogue.free_stage_9.1: Of course, I remember! It's so beautiful... Let's press on the sparkling golden key in the left top corner!
common_json.Race.dialogue.free_stage_9.2: The key that comes with the dirigible and allows you to unlock golden chests full of treasures? I'm pretty sure their contents worth it.
common_json.Race.dialogue.prem_stage_9.0: I'm so glad that we went for it! I can't even imagine flying in the balloon now.
common_json.Race.dialogue.prem_stage_9.1: Thank you, grandpa! It has always been my dream to cruise through the sky in such a pretty aircraft!
common_json.Race.dialogue.free_stage_16.0: Tough luck! The chests keep slipping through our fingers. What can we do to change that?
common_json.Race.dialogue.free_stage_16.1: It would've been much easier to approach them if we had another type of aircraft. Fortunately, I kept the dirigible leaflet!
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_50.0: Thank you, Chloe! I couldn't have done it without you. We made a great team, don't you think?
common_json.Race.dialogue.stage_50.1: The best team ever! I'll look forward to my invitation to the next race!
common_json.Race.rules.Title: How does it work?
common_json.Race.rules.text2: Compete with other players during the airship race and get propellers for each completed level. Finish in the top three to get even more rewards!
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_0.0: Chloe! My friends and I are organizing an airship race to celebrate Memorial Day and I want you to be my navigator!
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_0.1: It will be an honor, Grandpa! I knew it was a sign when I saw this special offer on a great zeppelin. Can we fly it?
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_0.2: Actually, I was thinking about my old hot air balloon which I've flown for the first Memorial Day race years ago. But I like your idea!
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_7.0: Great job, Chloe! Are you glad that you decided to partake in the Memorial Day race?
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_7.1: I couldn't be happier, grandpa! It feels great to be a part of history. I'm curious how many more chests will we open along the way?
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_50.0: Thank you, Chloe! It means a lot to me to have you by my side on this special day.
common_json.Memorial.Race.dialogue.stage_50.1: The pleasure is all mine! We have the whole summer season ahead of us to practice for our next race!

lang_json.Booster.MoveToDown: Move the booster to the bottom row!
lang_json.Fish.MoveToDown: Move the cup to the bottom row!
lang_json.CookieMan.MoveToDown: Move the cookie to the bottom row!
lang_json.CollectFireworkTutorial: You get an Ice Cream Cup for combining five or more elements! Match it with the same color to use!
lang_json.level20TutorialStep1: Rolling Pin is available! It will collect any column of sweets. Select the Rolling Pin!
lang_json.level20TutorialStep2: Use the Rolling Pin to collect sweets in this column!
lang_json.level18TutorialStep1: A blue donut is tied up and can’t be moved. Let’s untie the bow!
lang_json.level26TutorialStep1: Rainbow Rocket is available! It will collect all the sweets with matching colors, let’s try it!
lang_json.level26TutorialStep2: Collect all the red stars using the Rainbow Rocket!
lang_json.level16TutorialStep1: These are Soda Cups! Get them to the bottom row to collect. Move the Cup to the row below by matching the donuts!
lang_json.level16TutorialStep2: Time for the final step: make a line with the cupcakes to move the Soda Cup to the bottom and collect it!
lang_json.level23TutorialStep1: Match three Green Cupcakes next to a Chocolate Bar to slightly open it up!
lang_json.level23TutorialStep2: Now, match the Blue Donuts to reveal the Chocolate Bar a little bit more!
lang_json.level23TutorialStep3: And, finally, match the Red Stars to collect the Chocolate Bar!
lang_json.level31TutorialStep1: Match the sweets near the burgers to remove them!
lang_json.level46TutorialStep1: This is an ice cream maker! Match four different lines next to it to make it work! Let's start with the line of stars!
lang_json.level46TutorialStep3: Let’s do same with the third!
lang_json.level61TutorialStep1: Cells with cookies help you add extra points to the sweets which you can use during your next turn. Match donuts in a line!
lang_json.level61TutorialStep2: Now match the jellies in line and you will get an additional bonus to the one you already have!
lang_json.level70TutorialStep1: Time for advanced moves! Swap the sweets to make two Rainbow Cakes!
lang_json.level70TutorialStep2: Swap Rainbow Cakes with each other to clear all the cells on the field!
lang_json.level76TutorialStep1: There are so many butterflies! Let's catch some! Match a line to collect them!
lang_json.level91TutorialStep1: The Mouse is very fond of donuts, let's feed it!
lang_json.level106TutorialStep1: These are Jam Pots! Let's match blue Jam Pot with some Blue Donuts!
lang_json.level106TutorialStep2: With your each move the Jam in the Pot becomes hotter getting ready to explode! Remove the second Pot or it will explode on the next move!
lang_json.level121TutorialStep1: There is Jam everywhere! Try to get ice cream cones out of that mess!
lang_json.level121TutorialStep2: Oh! It continues to spread! Match sweets next to the Jam covered cell to clean it! The Jam will stop spreading during that move.
lang_json.level136TutorialStep1: Look! This is a caterpillar. It blocks the element behind it. Match a line with the affected element to remove it.
lang_json.level151TutorialStep1: Don't be scared! It's just honey. Match a line on the honey covered cell to collect it.
lang_json.level181TutorialStep1: Line up the sweets next to a lollipop to unwrap it! You can see how many sweet matches you need on the counter.
lang_json.level196TutorialStep1: Look! It's a cookie-man! You should move it to the bottom row. But there is a tricky part! Match a line with the ice cream cones to see what happens!
lang_json.level196TutorialStep2: If you don't move the cookie-man down, he will climb up! Match the jellies in a line and find out what the cookie-man will do.
lang_json.level226TutorialStep1: Let's see what's in these boxes. Match the sweets in a line next to them! There might be something curious inside!
lang_json.level256TutorialStep1: It's a box for donuts! Let's fill it!
lang_json.level256TutorialStep2: See! The first donut is already there! Match a line one more time!
lang_json.level256TutorialStep3: Wow! You're doing great! Another one is in the box! Let's do the same again!
lang_json.level256TutorialStep4: Good job! Match the final line to fill the box with donuts!
lang_json.level286TutorialStep1: Let's bake a Gingerbread house! Move each ingredient to the bottom of the field! Try doing this, for example.
lang_json.level286TutorialStep2: Excellent! Now do the same with the roof!
lang_json.level316TutorialStep1: Match a line to untie the boxes!
lang_json.level316TutorialStep2: Match one more line to open them, just like you did before!
lang_json.level346TutorialStep1: Line up the ice cream with other sweets of the same color and see what happens!
lang_json.level376TutorialStep1: Each cake has two sides. Match a line next to either one of them to collect the respective pieces!
lang_json.level406TutorialStep1: Match a line to clear the cells from the muffins!
lang_json.level406TutorialStep2: Note that some muffins have a cherry on top! Collect one more!
lang_json.level436TutorialStep1: It's a caterpillar's house! New caterpillar shows up every four moves. Make a move to see how it works!
lang_json.level466TutorialStep1: It's a gum machine! Charge it by matching lines next to it and the gum will hit five random targets!
lang_json.level466TutorialStep2: Match a line one more time!
lang_json.level466TutorialStep3: Release the gum by matching this line!
lang_json.level496TutorialStep1: Jam Jar releases jam every four moves. Match a line next to it to prevent that!
lang_json.level526TutorialStep1: To collect waffles line them up with the elements colored as the waffle filling!
lang_json.level556TutorialStep1: Match a line to lit a candle!
lang_json.level556TutorialStep2: Be careful! If you match a line next to a lit candle it will go out!
lang_json.level586TutorialStep1: Match a line to get rid of a wrapper!
lang_json.level586TutorialStep2: Look! We've found a chocolate rabbit! Match a line of jellies to collect it!
lang_json.level616TutorialStep1: Lollipops! They change in color with every move! Match a line and see what happens!
lang_json.level616TutorialStep2: Lollipops have changed their color! Notice that this a recurring process!
lang_json.level630TutorialStep1: These are the only red elements available on the field! But you can always match the lines nearby to add multipliers to the goal elements!
lang_json.level646TutorialStep1: It's a bow! Match a line with the decorated elements to remove a ribbon.
lang_json.level676TutorialStep1: The sweets in the bag can't be moved! Make a color matching line next to the bags to see what's inside!
lang_json.level706TutorialStep1: Look's like the puppy is a fan of ice cream! Match a line of cones to feed it!
lang_json.level736TutorialStep1: To collect a lily make a color matching line with it three times. Note that lily always shows the order of its future hues!
lang_json.level766TutorialStep1: Little colorful men appear at the bottom and then climb up! Try collecting them before they vanish by making a color matching line!
lang_json.level811TutorialStep1: To set off a bomb make a color matching line three times! Let's make a first step!
lang_json.level856TutorialStep1: Make a color matching line to break the ice!
lang_json.level976TutorialStep1: It's a stream! It progresses elements one cell forward with your every move! Match a line to see how it works.
lang_json.level1036TutorialStep1: To grow a lawn make a special line where one of the elements is on the grass and the other is not.
lang_json.level1096TutorialStep1: Match a line next to a jar to release a firefly!
lang_json.level1156TutorialStep1: Match all the necessary colors next to the firecrackers to blow them up. The color you use will activate a corresponding firecracker!
lang_json.level1216TutorialStep1: Match a line on a cell with ivy to keep it from growing!
lang_json.level1276TutorialStep1: Match a line next to a bottle to fill it! Do it again using the same color to collect it!
lang_json.level1336TutorialStep1: Bee makes honey every move. Match a line next to it to stop it!
lang_json.level1396TutorialStep1: Fries will take away one of your every fourth move. You can remove them from the field by matching a line nearby.
lang_json.level1411TutorialStep1: By matching a line next to the cookie you will add the specified amount of moves!
lang_json.level1456TutorialStep1: The barrier won't let you move the elements that are inside of it!
lang_json.level1516TutorialStep1: Match a line to collect a gum! Some pieces of gum require more matches to be collected!
lang_json.level1576TutorialStep1: You need to collect the top petal. In order to do that, match a line next to it using the corresponding color!
lang_json.level1636TutorialStep1: Make a color matching line by the candle as many times as displayed on the counter to see what happens!
lang_json.level1696TutorialStep1: Match a line next to a muffin to take it out the packaging!
lang_json.level1756TutorialStep1: Match a line by the bottle of mustard as many times as displayed on the counter to make a shot. Note that the bottle will change the direction after that!
lang_json.level1816TutorialStep1: Ice tiles will freeze any element that stays on them for more than one move!
lang_json.level1876TutorialStep1: To move syrup up a line match the elements with one of them being outside the syrup area!
lang_json.level1936TutorialStep1: It is just a stone. It's immune to the explosions and it cannot be moved.
lang_json.level2236TutorialStep1: To remove the blanket collect the elements with appropriate colors.

lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text0: Good day! We are glad to greet you in the Candy Land! My friends and I like to play and have fun. You are welcome to join us!
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text1: Wow! We stepped on Rainbow meadow! Look around, it seems like someone needs your help!
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text2: Brrr! There are the Ice Lands everywhere! Don’t stay on same spot for too long - it is too cold! Let's help the Ice Cream make something funny!
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text3: Just look how beautiful Candyland is in the evening!  Let's have some rest in the Sweet Woods and make melted marshmallows with toasted muffins.
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text4: Look around! There are Jelly Swamps with marmalade fish everywhere! Let's invite the Ice Cream to go fishing here together.
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text5: My friends and I are going to have a picnic! Join us! We have so many things to do: dance, watch the butterflies and of course grill some food!
lang_json.StartEpisodeWindow.Text6: We step on the land of Cookie Kingdom! The residents of this Kingdom are so cute. Let's go meet them!

lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text206: Fully rested, we are ready to see what this place has to offer. Let's get the most out of this wonderful opportunity!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text207: Our loot is delicious. Thank you for helping us to collect all these sweets. We will see you on another island!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text208: We live for exploring new places and cultures. Thank you for being a part of our team on this journey!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text209: Instead of going to the lake like everyone else we decided to visit one of our favorite places. Thank you for coming with us!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text210: Thank you for joining us! We had a lovely time together. Now we feel like going somewhere else. We hope that you'll come with us!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text211: We've had a great time sightseeing but it's far from the end. We have lots more to witness!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text212: Thanks for taking part in our amazing adventure. We hope that we can do even greater things in the future!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text213: It feels great to expand the horizons and see new things. There is no better way to do it than embracing the spirit of history!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text214: We had a lot of fun building the chocolate bridge together. Thank you for your help. It's about time we cross it!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text215: We're so happy that you're keeping us company on our journeys. We're sure that many more lie ahead of us!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text216: Thank you for keeping us company! You collected enough sweets to build a chocolate bench for everyone.
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text217: It's always better to travel together because you can share the excitement with your friends. Thank you for being a part of it all!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text218: Thank you for helping us realize our dream! It would've been impossible to assemble the carriage without all the sweets you collected.
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text219: It wasn't easy to climb this ladder while avoiding sticky caramel but we made it thanks to you. With friends like this anything is possible!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text220: We hope that you had as much fun swinging as we did! It was totally awesome and we can't wait to find even more ways to enjoy life!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text221: Thank you so much! It looks like we have enough treats to continue our exciting journey!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text222: Thank you so much for rescuing us on such a short notice! All this light you brought with you made it possible for us to collect even more treats.
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text223: Full of hopes and dreams  we are ready to charge forward to even sweeter journeys!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text224: We made it! All thanks to you. The best part is that this little journey was just a first step in a much greater adventure!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text225: We hope that you enjoyed it as much as we did. And judging by the number of sweets we collected you did!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text226: It was a lot of fun playing together! We hope that we can keep doing that even when there is more snow.
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text227: It was nice to enjoy some hot beverages and having fun at the rink but it's now time to move on!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text228: We had a great time with our snowball fight! We hope you can join us for our next adventure!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text229: We hope that you enjoyed it as much as we did because it's now time to dig even deeper!
lang_json.FinishEpisodeWindow.Text230: We hope that the next year will bring us even more delicious sweets that we will share with everyone!
lang_json.NativeInstallWindow.title: Get the app!
lang_json.NativeInstallWindow.text: The game is available on your device! Get it now!
lang_json.Forces.PeriodicBonus: Click here to play a daily game! Get prizes every day!
lang_json.HelpByFiveAttempts.text: We offer you our help inspired by your diligence!
lang_json.HelpByFiveAttempts.title: Help from buddies!
lang_json.BoosterCellTutorial: Hooray! It's a booster on the field. To receive the booster move it to the bottom of the field and get it upon the level completion!
lang_json.HeroWindow.help: 1. Make a line of four or more sweets to create a Hero!
lang_json.HeroWindow.help2: 2. Match a line with a hero to activate him!
lang_json.HeroWindow.D: Destroys all of the sweets nearby
lang_json.HeroWindow.A: Adds multipliers or turns sweets into heroes
lang_json.Goals.title: goals
lang_json.level1TutorialStep1: Collect donuts and jellies! Match lines next to the goal elements to add extra points to them. Note that any multiplier will disappear with your next move!
lang_json.level2TutorialStep1: A blue hero is available! Match four blue donuts to create the blue hero!
lang_json.level2TutorialStep2: Match a line with the hero to activate him! He will add multipliers to goal element or turn random sweets into heroes.
lang_json.level3TutorialStep1: Match a line with five elements to make a rainbow cake!
lang_json.level3TutorialStep2: Swapping the cake with any element will remove all the elements of that color from the field!
lang_json.level4TutorialStep1: Make lines on the cells with honey to collect it.
lang_json.level4TutorialStep2: Each level has a number of moves. This amount decreases by one with every step you make. Collect the required elements before running out of moves.
lang_json.level5TutorialStep1: Wow! Another hero! Let's summon him by matching four stars! Do not forget to activate his power!
lang_json.level6TutorialStep1: To open the box match a line next to it. Some boxes require more than one match to be opened.
lang_json.level7TutorialStep1: The new hero has joined us! Summon him by matching a line of four ice cream cones! Do not forget to activate his power!
lang_json.level8TutorialStep1: It is time for crazy combos! Swap two cakes with each other and they will blow up everything on the field!
lang_json.level9TutorialStep1: The great warrior will join us if you match a line of four green cupcakes! Activate him to see what he is capable of!
lang_json.level10TutorialStep1: Feed the mouse with donuts! The necessary amount is displayed on the counter under it!
lang_json.level12TutorialStep1: Caterpillar blocks an element it sits on. Make a match to get rid of it!
lang_json.level13TutorialStep1: The Spoon is available! It will collect any single sweet from any cell. Let’s try it out!
lang_json.level13TutorialStep2: Use The Spoon on the cell with honey to collect it!
lang_json.Activity.BeatFriend.title: Friends, follow me!
lang_json.Activity.BeatFriend.body1: The great traveler %{userName} took over the championship from %{friendName}!
lang_json.Activity.DailyTask.title: You are capable of anything!
lang_json.Activity.DailyTask.body1: %{userName} showed his skills once again by completing the task!
lang_json.Activity.DailyTask.body2: The task was easily executed by the master %{userName}!
lang_json.Activity.PassLevel.title: Going through levels is as easy as shelling peas!
lang_json.Activity.PassLevel.body2: I am a master of %{levelNo} level! Can you beat my %{score} score?
lang_json.Activity.PassLevel.body3: My journey will not stop the %{levelNo} level! He was left behind with a score of %{score}!

lang_json.LanternWindow.Title: Candy Machine
lang_json.LanternWindow.force: It's a miracle! I've accidentally turned my Candy Machine into a magic tool! Here, try it out. It should help you on your journey. You just need to beat levels to call it.
lang_json.LanternWindow.text: Complete levels on the first attempt and get special treats from the Candy Machine! The more you win, the more good things will come out of it at the beginning of the next level!
lang_json.SubscriptionWindow.MainText: Premium allows you to get a ton of bonuses every day! To get bonuses just enter the game once a day!
lang_json.RaffleWindow.description: Only from April 23rd to May 6th complete levels to get the lucky tickets. The winners will be announced on May 11th, 2020.
lang_json.GoalsTooltip: Collect goals to complete the level
lang_json.FirstBoostersBefore.force: Summon 5 random heroes and use their magic powers to collect all the sweets from the field.
lang_json.SecondBoostersBefore.force: Add 5 extra moves and utilize them to meet all your goals for this level.
lang_json.BoosterBeforeUse_5: Fills the gaming field with 5 random heroes

project_json.DailyCupRulesWindow.text2: The cup starts every hour. All players are given the same level even if they haven't reached it yet.
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text1: There was an ordinary shop with no ordinary sweets...
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text2: The sweets who can talk and share their own secret stories!
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text3: Hey, Sticky! Where did you go last night?
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text4: To a magic place full of sweets where you can play all night long!
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text5: Candyland?! So all the rumors are true!
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text6: Can we come with you tonight?
project_json.Comics.Begin.Text7: Yes! But we have to be back by morning.
